name: Cherry Crave cave Remake
description: I've decided to remake the Cherry crave cave series but this time with new characters for the series.  Introducing: Baba! The bear cat! She's Aqua's cousin from Elif. She can wall jump, and scamper through 9 levels!  The Ballblobs are back too, just as vain and as goofy, they DON'T want you to collect the cherries, however they are weak to power corn. (because:  ♫ it's CORN! It has the juice!♫) more additions will be added to this game when i get around to it.
